Generates tax each time a unit or research is produced.

data.name: Farm
data.description:
Harvestable Food source. Use a Villager to gather Food from the Farm.
Only one Villager can work each Farm.

data.name: Granary
data.description: Villagers can drop off Food at this building. Improves the Farm gather rate of nearby Villagers by +10% (stacks with other Granaries). Generates tax each time a resource is dropped off.
